ComicInfo.Summary:
Katie continues to “cosplay” her costume while making tiny pieces out of the hidden other-dimensional intergalactic parasites infesting Detroit. It doesn’t take the world’s greatest detective to see caped crusading never looked so… bootylicous!
Features 4 regular and risqué variants showcasing an all new costume, plus 2 outrageous regular and risqué election variants!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 4 | E | Election Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Winston Young | 5 | F | Risqué Election Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 6 | Note: The digital edition (11/2/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
